title: Barry Donald White Jr.
author: Barry Donald White Jr.
content: Hi I need a $25 dollar loan to my paypal account and can repay $50 On Dec. 25th - I'm trying to get something on Ebay ASAP- Thank you if you are able to help!

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: You created an account today and asked for a loan 10 minutes after you created your account. The most valid reasons you can be given loan by someone on this forum is if you are in a campaign earning money weekly.or if you have collateral. You are not qualified.

comments.author: Barry Donald White Jr.
comments.body: I do understand that, I have been looking everywhere and did just find this forum, but I am using my actual name and e-mail, and do frequently use my paypal - If Anyone is intersted in taking the "risk" - I am sure to pay them back as I've said I will!  Thanks!

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.created_time: December 09, 2023, 05:23:17 AMLast edit: December 09, 2023, 05:41:48 AM by BabyBandit
comments.body: Quote from: Barry Donald White Jr. on December 08, 2023, 05:11:20 PMHi I need a $25 dollar loan to my paypal account and can repay $50 On Dec. 25th - I'm trying to get something on Ebay ASAP- Thank you if you are able to help!I must admire your work, you going from window shopping at eBay empty pocket from searching at Google how to get free money?! And then you find this place of them all a forum for Bitcoin and crypto enthusiasts, it's a nice forum with smart members purely financial indeed.   But why the hell would someone give their hard earned money to a window shopper? You can also do what we do here, work, buy crypto and save it.But you know what? YOU need to create YOUR own success. Don't be weak and embarrass yourself like this and ask others for money when you an adult, you look like a loser to be honest.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=8.0 here go and look for some trading advice and start yourself, don't ask anyone else to do the work for you. Trust me, when you done you will feel proud over yourself and get inspiration to climb even higher in life. It's an addiction to chase success and you will love it. I promise!

comments.author: Barry Donald White Jr.
comments.body: That's Reasonable - I'll start reading these threads - For side interest - At least it'll be an opportunity to learn about what more people are doing out there! And I might even get into it at some point.  I've been leery of getting involved with something I know so little about, and did come here on the wrong premise, I suppose - But I do respect what you guys seem to be very knowledgeable about - I Guess I will close this loan request here although, I must still find a solution to my need of $25 dollars. But Since, I'll be getting paid on Tuesday, It shouldn't be a big deal. Okay! Thx!

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: To get loan you must have collateral. (Full information about: Collateral)Once you have it any lender would be happy give out loan for you.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: You have a higher chance of getting that $25 loan from your local moneylenders rather than here. They will know your face, your location or even have some of your documents so that in case you default it, they know where to get you from?Why choose to get a loan from the forum if you have no collateral?
